examples: they campaigned with zest and intelligence
she had a great zest for life

noun.description: The outer colored part of the peel of citrus fruit, used as flavoring.

verb.description: Scrape off the outer colored part of the peel of (a piece of citrus fruit) for use as flavoring.
examples: zest the orange and lemon, taking care to discard all of the white pith

origin: Late 15th century: from French zeste orange or lemon peel, of unknown origin.
